emotional_arc: Starts hopefulâ€”core pages load quickly. Confidence dips each time an expected control (checkbox, install prompt, dark-mode toggle, upload button, Add-task click) is missing or unresponsive. next_actions: Audit DOM & CSS for hidden/overlapping elements (e.g., checkbox, Add-Task, JSON upload).
Add explicit labels/ARIA roles and larger hit areas.
Provide empty-state hints (e.g., â€œNo tasks yet â€“ create one to try completionâ€).
